name: Whack-a-Miko みこち叩き
description:
"Whack-a-Miko" is a hololive fangame  inspired by the stream of Sakura Miko.

post on twitter:

https://twitter.com/AoiSora_3D/status/1446645643523477505

HOW TO PLAY 

Click play button to start, click screen again to pause.

 For web play :

  • L : type the hammer
  • Space : type a blank to make the hammer at the right row.
  • Enter : send the comment out to whack
  • Mouse : you can click all the buttons including volume up and down.

For mobile play : Just touch to type as normal mobile keyboard.

100% accuracy will have special voice!

CREDITS 

Design/Programming : AoiSora_3D

Art : lots of screenshot in source stream

Sound : lots of  stream clips
